short_name: hand with index finger and thumb crossed
interpretation:
The "Hand with Index Finger and Thumb Crossed" is a symbol of crossing, and represents the act of making a decision. This card suggests that you may be at a crossroads in your life, and you need to make a choice between two options. It can also indicate that you are feeling uncertain or hesitant about something, and you are seeking guidance or intuition to help you make the right decision.

When this card appears, it is important to trust your instincts and listen to your inner voice. Pay attention to the signs and signals around you, as they may hold important clues to guide you in the right direction. Be open to new possibilities and opportunities that may arise, and don't be afraid to take a chance.

The "Hand with Index Finger and Thumb Crossed" reminds us that sometimes we need to take a leap of faith and trust that everything will work out for the best. Trust yourself and trust the universe, and you will find the path that is right for you.
